root: Top-level sections mirror README: defaults, pipelines, modules, database, webui, alerts, baseline.
defaults: defaults: global knobs applied to all modules unless overridden. Good place for llm_min_severity and max_excerpt_lines.
defaults_llm_enabled: defaults.llm_enabled: true/false to enable LLM payload generation globally by default.
defaults_llm_min_severity: defaults.llm_min_severity: minimum severity that will generate an LLM payload; INFO/WARNING/ERROR/CRITICAL.
defaults_max_excerpt_lines: defaults.max_excerpt_lines: cap lines included around each finding in an LLM payload.
pipelines: pipelines: reusable grouping + classifier bundles referenced by modules via pipeline name.
pipelines_match: pipelines.match.filename_regex: regex that decides which files a pipeline should handle, e.g. 'rsnapshot.*\\.log'.
pipelines_grouping: pipelines.grouping: choose 'whole_file' or 'marker' and configure start/end for marker mode.
pipelines_classifier: pipelines.classifier: classifier type plus error/warning/ignore regex lists.
pipelines_llm: pipelines.llm: enable per-pipeline LLM payloads and optional prompt_template path.
pipelines_ignore: pipelines.classifier.ignore_regexes: regexes for log lines that should be ignored when counting severities.
modules: modules: concrete tasks tying a path + mode to a pipeline and output options.
modules_path: modules.path: source log file or directory. Must be readable by log-triage.
modules_mode: modules.mode: 'batch' for one-shot scans, 'follow' for tailing, 'journal' for systemd logs (if implemented).
modules_pipeline: modules.pipeline: name of the pipeline entry controlling grouping/classifier for this module.
modules_llm_payload_mode: modules.llm_payload_mode: 'errors_only' (default) or 'full' for what goes into LLM payload files.
modules_only_last_chunk: modules.only_last_chunk: legacy toggle to look at only the latest run; ignored in findings-first mode.
modules_exit_code_by_severity: modules.exit_code_by_severity: map severity to process exit codes for automation.
modules_alerts: modules.alerts: webhook and/or MQTT alert sinks with per-module min_severity.
modules_baseline: modules.baseline: anomaly-detection window and multipliers controlling severity bump on anomalies.
modules_stream: modules.stream: stream/tailing settings like from_beginning and interval for follow-mode modules.
database: database: URL and retention_days. Both CLI and Web UI use this DB for historical findings.
database_retention_days: database.retention_days: how many days of stored findings to keep before cleanup.
webui: webui: HTTP binding (host/port/base_path) plus secret_key, allowed_ips, and admin_users.
webui_admin_users: webui.admin_users: username + password_hash entries for logging into the Web UI.
webui_allowed_ips: webui.allowed_ips: list of IPs allowed to access the Web UI. Empty list means allow all.
webui_secret_key: webui.secret_key: long random string used for session signing; rotate to invalidate sessions.
webui_session_cookie_name: webui.session_cookie_name: customize cookie name to avoid clashes behind reverse proxies.
alerts: alerts: shared options for webhook/MQTT alerting across modules, if used.
baseline: baseline: common defaults for baseline/anomaly detection across modules.
